    • About


    We live and breathe by these words… SERVICE – INTEGRITY – COMMITMENT! Whether you are new to the market, thinking of moving up, or an experienced investor, my team and I have the expertise, proven track record, and resources to help you buy or sell your next home. Enthusiasm, area knowledge, technology savvy and personal concern for my clients’ interests combine to make us an outstanding resource for your real estate transaction. We work extensively to help Buyers and Sellers meet their real estate goals. Our power team brings a wealth of business and financial expertise to the table but mostly we understand and appreciate the TRUE meaning of Client SERVICE!

    Awards & Designations - Washingtonian Magazine 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019 Top Realtor Team.
